RooAbsData * TreeToRooDataSet (TChain *chain, TCut cut, bool isUnbinned)
 Loops over events indicated by the entryList and apply the cuts of the specific category. It returns a RooDataSet if unbinned, a RooDataHist for binned.

Detailed Description

Zee Fit class: BW+CB and Cruijff.

Description: class that provide flexible and simple way to fit the Zee invariant mass shape with different pdfs:

  • BW+CB
  • Cruijff
